video.title: Bridezillas
video.synopsis: Some weddings may be fairy tales come true, but these ceremonies are more like nightmares due to the explosive behavior of the brides involved.

episodes.synopsis: Narcissistic Haley spars with her future mother-in-law, who's also the wedding planner, and teen bride Ariel makes it clear that she gives the orders.
episodes.title: Haley & Ariel

episodes.synopsis: Demanding Dezjuan is incensed when her bridesmaids fail to meet her expectations, and bratty Ariel overreacts to a joint bachelor-bachelorette party.
episodes.title: Dezjuan & Ariel

episodes.synopsis: Conceited Amanda takes exploitation to a new level. Meanwhile, Dezjuan goes from jittery to meltdown, jeopardizing her nuptials.
episodes.title: Amanda & Dezjuan

episodes.synopsis: Persnickety Amanda sees her fantasy wedding nearly go up in flames, and overbearing Dekeydra bullies her way through the week.
episodes.title: Amanda & Dekeydra

episodes.synopsis: Domineering Dekeydra runs roughshod over the bridal party, while critical Joraine makes demands on her future husband.
episodes.title: Dekeydra & Joraine

episodes.synopsis: Uncompromising Joraine lets anxiety get the better of her. Meanwhile, obnoxious Amanda uses shocking tactics to get her way.
episodes.title: Joraine & Amanda

episodes.synopsis: Amanda melts down minutes before her wedding introduction, while prima donna Miyesha demands worship from her bridesmaids.
episodes.title: Amanda & Miyesha

episodes.synopsis: Callous Miyesha almost comes to blows with everybody she believes has crossed her, and psychotic Stephanie gets violent with her fiancé.
episodes.title: Miyesha & Stephanie

episodes.synopsis: Stephanie's bachelorette party is capped off by a shocking showdown, and Taneema shrinks her fiancé's bank balance to have the wedding her way.
episodes.title: Stephanie & Taneema

episodes.synopsis: Stephanie's lies add up to a hefty wedding-reality check. Meanwhile, spoiled Krystal spares no expense for her dream wedding.
episodes.title: Stephanie & Krystal

episodes.synopsis: Surly Krystal loses her cool with her bridal party. Meanwhile, vain Evelina blows a fuse when her wedding shoot doesn't go as planned.
episodes.title: Krystal & Evelina

episodes.synopsis: Evelina spoils all her fiancé's fun by crashing his bachelor party, and extravagant Yovanna stretches her fiancé's wallet -- along with his patience.
episodes.title: Evelina & Yovanna

episodes.synopsis: Unhinged Yovanna pushes her family past the breaking point, while Aleshia goes bonkers over a text message.
episodes.title: Yovanna & Aleshia

episodes.synopsis: Melodramatic Aleshia ignores all the signs of an ill-fated wedding. Meanwhile, Sophia denigrates her bodybuilding fiancé.
episodes.title: Aleshia & Sophia

episodes.synopsis: Blubbering bride Sophia can't stop weeping on her wedding day, and Ashley struggles with her animal bridal party.
episodes.title: Sophia & Ashley

episodes.synopsis: Squirrel-lover Ashley receives an unexpected gift from a furry friend. Meanwhile, free-spirited Ariane gets kinky while partying with her bridesmaids.
episodes.title: Ashley & Ariane

episodes.synopsis: Cranky Ariane pushes her family to the brink. Meanwhile, Roxy -- a former "Survivor" contestant -- gets belligerent with an innocent bystander.
episodes.title: Ariane & Roxy

episodes.synopsis: Obstinate Roxy releases her wrath for the sake of the perfect wedding, while volatile Mai-Lee fights with her bridal party over wedding favors.
episodes.title: Roxy & Mai-Lee

episodes.synopsis: Volcanic Mai-Lee rules her wedding preparations with an iron fist, and spoiled Angela makes arrangements for her fiancé to get waxed.
episodes.title: Mai-Lee & Angela

episodes.synopsis: Snotty Angela issues an ultimatum that results in a wedding objection. Meanwhile, Adrianne fuels a feud with her future brother-in-law.
episodes.title: Angela & Adrianne

episodes.synopsis: Self-pitying Adrianne realizes that back fat is the least of her wedding problems, while pseudo-socialite Willaura demands celebrity status.
episodes.title: Adrianne & Willaura

episodes.synopsis: Phony socialite Willaura has a meltdown on her wedding day. Meanwhile, cocky Megan makes dubious choices after blasting her helpers.
episodes.title: Willaura & Megan
